rules_text:
Gain life equal to the greatest toughness among creatures you control.
Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Put a 3/3 green and white Cat Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.
You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +5/+5 and have lifelink.”
special_text:
[+1]: Gain life equal to the greatest toughness among creatures you control.
[0]: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
[-1]: Put a 3/3 green and white Cat Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +5/+5 and have lifelink.”
